verses.roman:
cāṇūre muṣṭike kūṭe
śale tośalake hate
śeṣāḥ pradudruvur mallāḥ
sarve prāṇa-parīpsavaḥ

synonyms: cāṇūre muṣṭike kūṭe—Cāṇūra, Muṣṭika and Kūṭa; śale tośalake—Śala and Tośala; hate—being killed; śeṣāḥ—those remaining; pradudruvuḥ—ran away; mallāḥ—wrestlers; sarve—all; prāṇa—their lives; parīpsavaḥ—hoping to save.
translation: Cāṇūra, Muṣṭika, Kūṭa, Śala and Tośala having been killed, the remaining wrestlers all fled for their lives.
